reviews.title: Giang Vo Egg Coffee
reviews.description: A small but cozy corner. The egg coffee here is creamy and not fishy at all. The owner is very friendly, melodious Trinh music fits the mood on rainy days.
reviews.author: NhanDQ

comments.comment: My favorite spot, the egg foam is beaten very fluffy!
comments.author: Minh Anh

comments.comment: Best egg coffee in Hanoi so far! Highly recommend.
comments.author: David

comments.comment: Nice vibe but a bit crowded on weekends.
comments.author: Sarah

reviews.title: Cloud Hunting at Cau Dat
reviews.description: Waking up at 4am to hunt clouds is a worthwhile experience. A sea of clouds floats beneath the green tea hills. Note that the road is quite cold and foggy, everyone remember to dress warmly.
reviews.author: PhuongThao

comments.comment: The view is breathtaking! Worth the early wake up.
comments.author: Mike

comments.comment: It was freezing but the photos turned out amazing.
comments.author: Linh

comments.comment: Too many people, hard to get a solo shot.
comments.author: JohnDoe

reviews.title: Saigon Night Broken Rice
reviews.description: Broken rice with ribs, skin, and egg meatloaf - the soul of Saigon cuisine. The charcoal-grilled ribs are fragrant, served with thick fish sauce over hot rice. The shop opens until 2am, saving hungry night owls.
reviews.author: TuanKiet

comments.comment: Ribs are delicious but had to wait a bit long.
comments.author: HungLong

comments.comment: Authentic Saigon taste! The fish sauce is key.
comments.author: An

reviews.title: Hoi An Ancient Town at Night
reviews.description: Hoi An is most beautiful when the lanterns light up. Walking along the Hoai River, releasing flower lanterns and eating Cao Lau. The peaceful, ancient space is completely different from the hustle of the city.
reviews.author: NhanDQ

comments.comment: So romantic! A must-visit place in Vietnam.
comments.author: Emily

comments.comment: Beautiful but food prices are a bit high for tourists.
comments.author: LocalGuide

reviews.title: Majestic Ma Pi Leng Pass
reviews.description: One of the four great mountain passes of Vietnam. The winding road runs beside the deep emerald Nho Que river. The feeling of driving a motorbike here is extremely awesome!
reviews.author: PhuotThu

comments.comment: Dangerous roads but the view is absolutely worth it.
comments.author: BikerVN

comments.comment: Look at that river color! Stunning.
comments.author: NatureLover

reviews.title: Bep Trang Frog Quang Noodles
reviews.description: Frog Quang noodle is a specialty not to be missed when visiting Da Nang. Frogs are braised with fragrant lemongrass and turmeric, served with fresh green vegetables.
reviews.author: FoodReviewer

comments.comment: Very unique taste, the frog meat is tender.
comments.author: GourmetHunter

comments.comment: Spicy and flavorful. Loved the fresh herbs.
comments.author: HealthyEats

comments.comment: Good but a bit too salty for my taste.
comments.author: Tourist123
